attributes.action: Insist The Minister Of Sport Initiates a Halt To Future Footballers Wage Increases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With players now earning in excess of £100,000 per week for nothing more than playing football twice a week.
Supporters are now struggling to support clubs as they did in the past,and its now becoming a joke when players are earning in a week what the supporters are hardly likely to earn in 2 or 3 years.
Get football back to basics.
